app.title: Subscription Debt Manager
app.subtitle: Track and manage your recurring subscriptions

profile.title: Account Settings
profile.confirmLogout: Are you sure you want to log out?
profile.passwordRequired: Please fill in all password fields
profile.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
profile.requiresRecentLogin: Please log out and log in again to change this

metrics.futureDebtSubtitle: Total cost of all upcoming renewals

validation.costInvalid: Cost must be a positive number
validation.dateFuture: Renewal date must be in the future
validation.formErrors: Please fix the errors in the form
validation.failedToSave: Failed to save subscription. Please try again.
validation.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this subscription?

duplicates.title: Possible Duplicate
duplicates.description: We found subscriptions with similar names. Make sure you're not adding a duplicate:
duplicates.proceed: Would you like to proceed anyway?

backup.title: Backup & Restore
backup.description: Backup your subscriptions locally or restore from a previously downloaded backup file.
backup.restoreHelper: Select a .json backup file to restore your subscriptions. This will add all subscriptions from the file.
backup.autoBackupInfo: Your subscriptions are automatically backed up to your browser's local storage. Up to 10 backups are kept.
backup.restoreError: Failed to restore backup. Make sure it's a valid backup file.

about.title: About Subscription Debt Manager
about.description: Take control of your subscription spending and manage recurring payments with confidence. Our app helps you track, analyze, and optimize your subscriptions to reduce monthly costs and eliminate forgotten recurring charges.

feature1.name: Real-Time Expense Tracking
feature1.description: Monitor all your subscriptions in one place with detailed cost breakdowns and spending trends

feature2.name: Smart Renewal Reminders
feature2.description: Get email notifications before your subscriptions renew so you never miss an opportunity to save

feature3.name: Spending Analytics & Insights
feature3.description: Visualize your spending patterns with interactive charts and identify areas to cut costs

feature4.name: Subscription Management
feature4.description: Easily manage, pause, or cancel subscriptions with our intuitive and simple interface

footer.copyright: © 2024 Subscription Debt Manager. All rights reserved.
